nodes.bodyText:
@david-allison-1 with apologies for the noisiness of the diff, this is the actual logic change - does it look right to you now? (only applying the "is it a system web browser?" check if we are restricted
It did pass local testing but I'm going to pick this to 2.10-release immediately after merge so a second set of eyes is 🥇
Note the system API to queryIntentActivities is guaranteed to return empty list / nonnull if there are no handlers, that's important :)
Codacy left me a comment that was actually right and pointed out a flaw. I just re-pushed
(optional): Could be extracted out of the loop for clarity.
cannot actually, we must know we have at least one entry in the list before true is ever returned, so it has to be in the loop signifying we have size() >= 1
Would be useful in a clarifying comment then (for next time) 😉

Aw dang. Fixed a couple of those but this will have to sit. Next time...
Thank you for double-checking though, I do appreciate it even though I short-circuited a bit. Could've always done a beta4 np if there was something goofy in here
